scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server & npm run dev --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/data && npm run build --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server && npm run build --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server & npm run dev --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/data && npm run type-check --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server && npm run type-check --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client
scripts.test: npm run build:data && concurrently -k -s first -n data,server,client -c blue,magenta,green "npm run test --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/data" "npm run test --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server" "npm run test --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:data && concurrently -k -s first -n data,server,client -c blue,magenta,green "npm run test:coverage --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/data" "npm run test:coverage --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/server" "npm run test:coverage --workspace=@vidsrc-wrapper/client"
scripts.docker:run: docker run -d --name vidsrc --restart unless-stopped -p 8080:80 -e TMDB_API_KEY=$TMDB_API_KEY vidsrc-wrapper:latest
